mapper.sql: id, isdeleted, title, content, attachment_source, type, address, shangbaoren, shangbaotime, lianren, liantime, paifaren, paifatime, endtime, x, y, yhzh, createId, createTime, delflag
mapper.insert: insert into countryside_problem ( id, isdeleted, title, content, attachment_source, type, address, shangbaoren, shangbaotime, lianren, liantime, paifaren, paifatime, endtime, x, y, yhzh, createId createTime, delflag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shangbaoren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shangbaotime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lianren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liantime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{paifaren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paifatime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select:
select count(1) from countryside_problem where delflag = 'A'
and yhzh like concat('%', #{page.yhzh}, '%')
and isdeleted like concat('%', #{page.isdeleted}, '%')
and createTime > #{page.startTime}
and createTime < #{page.endTime}
and (shangbaoren like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%') or title like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%') or type like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%'))
and createId like concat('%', #{page.createId}, '%')
mapper.update: update countryside_problem set delflag = 'D' where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update countryside_problem set isdeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shangbaoren = #{shangbaoren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lianren = #{lianren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paifaren = #{paifaren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, x = #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, y = #{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yhzh = #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into countryside_problem ( isdeleted, title, content, attachment_source, type, address, shangbaoren, shangbaotime, x, y, yhzh, createId, createTime, delflag) values (#{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shangbaoren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shangbaotime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select a.*,b.shangbaoid,b.chuliren,b.chulitime,b.chulimiaoshu,b.shenheren,b.shenhetime,b.shenhemiaoshu from countryside_problem a,countryside_chuli b where a.id=b.shangbaoid and a.id=#{id}

select a.*,b.shangbaoid,b.chuliren,b.chulitime,b.chulimiaoshu,b.shenheren,b.shenhetime,b.shenhemiaoshu from countryside_problem a,countryside_chuli b where a.id=b.shangbaoid and delflag = 'A'
and yhzh like concat('%', #{page.yhzh}, '%')
and isdeleted like concat('%', #{page.isdeleted}, '%')
order by createTime desc limit #{page.start},#{page.pageSize}

select count(1) from countryside_problem where delflag = 'A'
and yhzh like concat('%', #{page.yhzh}, '%')
and isdeleted like concat('%', #{page.isdeleted}, '%')
and createTime > #{page.startTime}
and createTime < #{page.endTime}
and (shangbaoren like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%') or title like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%') or type like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%'))
and createId like concat('%', #{page.createId}, '%')

select count(1) from countryside_problem where delflag = 'A' and isdeleted != 4
and yhzh like concat('%', #{page.yhzh}, '%')
and createTime > #{page.startTime}
and createTime < #{page.endTime}
and shangbaoren like concat('%', #{page.people}, '%')
and createId like concat('%', #{page.createId}, '%')
and (shangbaoren like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%') or title like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%') or type like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%'))

select count(1) from countryside_problem where delflag = 'A' and isdeleted = 2
and yhzh like concat('%', #{page.yhzh}, '%')
and createTime > #{page.startTime}
and createTime < #{page.endTime}
and paifaren like concat('%', #{page.people}, '%')
and createId like concat('%', #{page.createId}, '%')
and (shangbaoren like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%') or title like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%') or type like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%'))

select count(1) from countryside_problem where delflag = 'A' and isdeleted = 4
and yhzh like concat('%', #{page.yhzh}, '%')
and createTime > #{page.startTime}
and createTime < #{page.endTime}
and (paifaren like concat('%', #{page.people}, '%') or lianren like concat('%', #{page.people}, '%'))
and createId like concat('%', #{page.createId}, '%')
and (shangbaoren like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%') or title like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%') or type like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%'))
select id, isdeleted, x, y from countryside_problem where id = #{id}

select
from countryside_problem where delflag = 'A'
and yhzh like concat('%', #{page.yhzh}, '%')
and isdeleted like concat('%', #{page.isdeleted}, '%')
and createTime > #{page.startTime}
and createTime < #{page.endTime}
and title like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%')
and createId like concat('%', #{page.createId}, '%')
limit #{page.start},999999
select count(id) from countryside_problem where isdeleted = 0 and delflag = "A"
select count(id) from countryside_problem where isdeleted > 0 and delflag = "A"
select count(id) from countryside_problem where isdeleted > 1 and delflag = "A"
select count(id) from countryside_problem where isdeleted > 2 and delflag = "A"
select count(id) from countryside_problem where isdeleted = 4 and delflag = "A"
select count(id) as count,QUARTER(createTime) as isdeleted from countryside_problem where YEAR(createTime) = #{col} and delflag = "A" GROUP BY QUARTER(createTime)

select a.isdeleted,ifnull(b.count,0) as count from cgisdeleted as a left join( select isdeleted,count(1) as count from countryside_problem where delflag = 'A' group by isdeleted) as b on a.isdeleted=b.isdeleted
select count(id) from countryside_problem where isdeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delflag = 'A'
select count(id) as count,QUARTER(createTime) as quarter from countryside_problem where YEAR(createTime) = #{year} and delflag = 'A' GROUP BY QUARTER(createTime)
